name: Deep Zoom Hallucination by Peter Gric

metadata.name: Deep Zoom Hallucination - Attachment
metadata.description: An AI-rendered journey into Peter Gric painting Attachment II from 2017 (acrylics on canvas, 100 x 120 cm). He guided the DiscoDiffusion AI with several consecutive text prompts to steer the transformation in the desired direction. Seamless audiovisual loop, length: 4:49
